name: Angry Troll
description:
Angry Troll is a Tower Defense game where you have to build attacking structures to fight off waves of evil trolls.
Hordes of trolls are trying to break into your kingdom. Stop them!
Upgrade your buildings and use your abilities to contain waves of enemies.
Some towers have their own characteristics, some slow down the enemy, some shoot long distances, some inflict damage on the area.
The main thing is to correctly assess the situation in order to arrange the towers correctly.
Use your resources wisely, and then you will succeed!

Features:
-Various enemies
-Attacking abilities
Improvements for towers
-8 levels
-Difficult gameplay
